gear_tradeoffs.pros: Self-sustain, great for solo and boss fights
gear_tradeoffs.cons: Lower team utility if not paired with Perception/Speed

gear_tradeoffs.pros: Boosts ACC and SPD for debuffing

overview.best_dungeon_use: Ice Golem, Dragon, Doom Tower (Scarab King)

a1.name: Feathered Staff
a1.notes: Each hit has a 10% (up to 30% with books) chance of placing a 5% Poison debuff for 2 turns.

a2.name: Lore of Restoration
a2.notes: Attacks 1 enemy. Heals all allies by 10% of their MAX HP, plus 2.5% per debuff on the target.

a3.name: Weight of Aeons
a3.notes: Places 50% Decrease ATK on all enemies for 2 turns. 75% chance to decrease each enemyâ€™s Turn Meter by 20%. If enemy has 50%+ TM after, places 30% Decrease C.RATE for 2 turns.

passive.impact: Increases the duration of 2 random debuffs on the attacker by 1 turn when attacked (once per hit).

booking.notes: Books increase Poison chance (A1), healing and cooldown (A2), debuff chance and cooldown (A3). All skills benefit.

damage_per_turn.a1: Low-moderate, 2.1x ATK per hit, Poison chance

rotation.average_damage: Low-moderate (main value is debuffing and healing)

scenarios.notes: Procs on A1 and A2, increases overall damage and Poison output.
Useful for Scarab King, helps with debuff extension and sustain.
Not a primary damage dealer, but Warmaster adds value.

clan_boss.damage_per_turn: Low-moderate (main value is debuff uptime, Poison, and healing)
clan_boss.notes: Provides consistent Decrease ATK, Poison, and healing. Not a top damage dealer but excellent for team survivability.

synergy.relentless_viability: Viable for more frequent debuffing and healing, but can cause rotation desync.

investment.notes: Aox is a versatile support for Clan Boss, Dungeons, and Doom Tower. High ROI for early and mid-game accounts.

owned_comparison.comparison: Higher Poison output, less healing and debuff utility.

draft_logic.notes: Aox is a strong early pick for sustain and debuffing. Counter-pick against heavy damage teams.

gear_set_stability.Reflex: Can reduce cooldowns for more frequent healing/debuffs.
gear_set_stability.Relentless: More turns, but can desync skill rotation.
gear_set_stability.Savage: Not recommended (no DEF Down, not a nuker).

rotation_desync_risks.Relentless: Moderate risk, can throw off skill order.

utility_comparison.comparison: Higher Poison output, less healing and debuff utility.

ratings.relentless_viability: B (can be useful, but not always optimal)

final_summary.damage_rotation: Low-moderate, main value is debuff uptime and healing
final_summary.turn_meter_stability: Stable with Speed/Perception/Regeneration; Relentless can desync
final_summary.passive_impact: Excellent for extending debuffs on bosses and in PvP
final_summary.gear_stat_notes: Prioritize ACC, SPD, HP%, DEF% for best results
final_summary.ally_synergy_impact: Pairs well with Poisoners and debuffers (e.g., Bad-el-Kazar)
final_summary.draft_value: High for sustain and debuff teams

team_setups.name: Clan Boss Debuff Team
team_setups.strategy: Maximize Poison, Decrease ATK, and healing for survivability.

team_setups.name: Doom Tower Scarab King
team_setups.strategy: Sustain and debuff extension for boss control.
